General.Name: Irwin Naturals Inc
General.Description: Irwin Naturals, Inc. engages in the development and distribution of vitamins and other health supplements in the United States, Canada, and internationally. The company offers CBD oils, gummies, soft gels, CBD creams, balms and roll-ons, vitamins and supplements, topicals, and other products. It also operates mental health clinics. The company sells its products through health food stores and mass market retailers, as well as through e-commerce retailers. It offers its products under the Irwin Naturals and Nature's Secret brands. The company was formerly known as Datinvest International Ltd. Irwin Naturals, Inc. is headquartered in Los Angeles, California.
General.Address: 5310 Beethoven Street, Los Angeles, CA, United States, 90066
